appsgate.lig.undefined.sensor.spec
Interface CoreUndefinedSensorSpec

All Known Implementing Classes:
EnoceanUndefinedSensorImpl
public interface CoreUndefinedSensorSpec

This java interface is an ApAM specification shared by all ApAM AppsGate application to handle undefined or ambiguous sensors.

Since:
February 6, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard

Method Summary
 org.json.JSONArray getCapabilities()
          This method get the available profiles that corresponding to this ambiguous sensor.
 void validate(java.lang.String profile)
          This method send to the EnOcean dump bundle the corresponding profile to that sensor in order to validate the configuration and receive telegrams from it.
 

Method Detail

getCapabilities

org.json.JSONArray getCapabilities()
This method get the available profiles that corresponding to this ambiguous sensor. If no profiles corresponding this sensor is not yet implemented.

Returns:
a JSON description that contain the network profile of this sensor and an user friendly interpretation. ex: For EnOcean switch this method return the following JSONArray [{"profile":"EEP-05-02-01", "type":"switch sensor"},{"profile":"EEP-05-04-01", "type":"Key card sensor"}]

validate

void validate(java.lang.String profile)
This method send to the EnOcean dump bundle the corresponding profile to that sensor in order to validate the configuration and receive telegrams from it.

Parameters:
profile - the chosen sensor profile
